commits.message:
EUCA-11023 eucanetd cannot start dhcpd due to udp port binding conflict from dnsmasq

Cherry Pick of commit 63cf178 from maint-4.1 to master

Description: Newer versions of dhcpd will not start if a process is listening
             on the DHCP service port (67).

Changes: Changed the eucanetd startup script to test if a process is listening
         on the DHCP service port and will fail to launch eucanetd if one is
         found. A message is displayed to the console when this happens.

Testing: Tested with dnsmasq running to verify that the error message and
         tested without anything running to verify that eucanetd starts
         without any issues.
